attributes.action: MEPs who change nationality to be forced to go
attributes.additional_details: In a television interview this morning a british MEP (who is the chair of a finance committe in Brussels) said that she is applying to change her nationality/citizenship to Irish out of her shame over David Cameron supporting the UK people in keeping our sovereignty in the vote this morning.  It MUST be that any such action by any british MEP should immediately be responded to by dismissal and withdrawal of ANY and ALL financial support, in any form, from that individual.
